name: Wen777.GitHub.io
body:
## About Wen-Hsiang Shih

I am an entrepreneur and full-stack developer with hands on experience bringing digital products to market fast

I'm interested in the following jobs:
- Python based jobs (Tornado, Flask, Django)
- jobs where scalability becomes an issue, like database scaling, caching (redis), load-balancing (nginx), service discovering.
- jobs where security is very important (SSL, certificates, click hijacking, XSS prevention)
- to build a beautiful REST-API, possibly in combination with BackboneJS

### Project

* Agilearning, online coding environment hosting service, 2014/12 - 2015/02

I provide the technique of scaling, such as Linux server cluster(Google Cloud, Digital Ocean, Linode), db cluster(Mongodb replica cluster). In one season, made prototype product become a MVP with paying customer.


### Education

* #### Department of Communications Engineering, 
Feng Chia University, 2012 - 2014 undergraduate

* #### National Dali Senior High School
2009 - 2012
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
